name: Frontier Prospecting Simulator
description:
Game takes you to the future on a distant planet in outer rim of our milky way galaxy. Help annoyed but always willing prospector to find the largest catch of his lifetime.

Controls:

  • [W] [A] [S] [D] - Move camera
  • [Q] [E] - Rotate camera
  • [R] [F] - Zoom camera
  • [Left click] - Select
  • [Left click + Drag] - Pan camera
  • [Middle click + Drag] - Rotate camera
  • [Mouse scroll] - Zoom camera

Tips:

Click on rover to select it. Search surroundings for resources indigated on lower right display. When resource found, press prospect button. Prospecting need 5 units of oxygen to mix with fuel and supply drilling machine.

When you run out of oxygen to prospect, go with rover next to oxygen generator and load button will appear to replenish from generator.

You can turn sound off in Pause Menu, especially if you can't stand my voice acting =)

Software used:

Unity 3d, Substance Painter, Blender, Affinity Photo, Audacity

All sounds have free license or are made by me.

Known bugs:

- Speed on camera controls using hotkeys is not desirable in browser, best use panning and zooming with mouse control to move around.

- Red crystals always awards 200c regardless of weight of finding, I find the fact that I even put it into screenshot and didn't notice amusing
